text: @MSNBC Tons of conflicts of interest, not a clinical trial, no blind or independent analysis, a data scraper ran by a company pushing a covid-19 test worldwide,  c-level member who openly supports Biden, founded by heart surgeons who conclude heart medicines help covid best.  ok?
